title: At 119 degrees, Sicily may have recorded Europe's highest temperature in modern history
content:
1. At 119 degrees, Sicily may have recorded Europe's highest temperature in modern history  USA TODAY
  2. Wildfire breaks out east of Rome, locals evacuated  Reuters
  3. Italy sees 'Europe's hottest ever temperature' as wildfires rage - BBC News  BBC News
  4. OPINION: Bargain homes and fewer crowds - but Italy's deep south is not for everyone  The Local Italy
  5. Sicily just broke the European record for all-time highest temperature  Popular Science
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: シチリア島の気温が119度に達し、ヨーロッパの近代史における最高気温を記録した可能性があることが判明
西西里岛气温高达119度，可能创下了欧洲现代史上的最高温度
西西里島氣溫高達119度，可能創下了歐洲現代史上的最高溫度
